I'd suggest getting a solar system and batteries. That's off grid power. And oversize your system so that in the summer, you can use a water condenser [think AC unit that is optimized to condense water rather than cooling air since that's exactly what it is]. You then can store it and pump it for all uses specific to you = drinking, bathing, washing face and hands. Rainwater is great for toilets and washing dishes and clothes. Any of the above and grey water is great for garden irrigation [pee is great nitrogen fertilizer, so put that into something like a urinal/sink which can be "flushed" with a very small bit of water which also helps dilute it]. A composting toilet can be used for poop > fertilizer, but an even better solution is an Israeli methane producing toilet/composting system that produces methane to cook with and liquid fertilizer for plants. Generally, solar hot water systems [evacuated tube] are excellent for heating both water and living spaces [with perhaps some backup for long, cold cloudy spells - not necessary in some climates, more so in Canada probably.

Hi! I suspect that a PREVIOUS DESIGN is being used in this video to realize the dew tower without mentioning the original inventor! This tower is called WARKA WATER by Italian architect ARTURO VITTORI and has been designed many years ago, and was even constructed at the Venice Biennale of Architecture. The tower was intended as a solidarity open-source invention, and not to become the subject of a video on which someone else can gain profit!! I had an off-grid cabin that I lived in for four years. My water came from a stream. While building the shelter I bathed in the stream; it was cold but felt good on the hot days. Upstream I put in a pipe that went all the way down to the cabin and if you looked at it from sideways it, the pipe entry, was taller than the roof of the cabin so I had gravity fed water. That water was first hooked up to an outdoor shower then went to my indoor bathroom sink and finally to an outdoor fountain/catch basin. I honestly used the outside water more often than the inside water. Showering outside during the summer was OK but no way during winter. I hadn’t gotten the chance to enclose that before I left so I am curious to know if the person that bought it and closed it or not. The water was tested before I moved there and it did not have any issues. So I was able to drink it without filtering it.

I have a few questions, mostly about the dew collector.
You see, in the dessert the temperatures drop like a stone on a river at night and skyrocket at day due to the lack of moisture in the air, which is why its not much of a concern to pull as much moisture out of it as possible, life in desserts has already evolved to survive that, but in places where the moisture in the air is much more prevalen such as forests and jungles, taking a bit too much of it out of the air could become a big ans rapid change in those environments, mainly due to the fact that such moisture helps in the process of retaining a more stable temperature when compared to a place like a desert, so my question is... would the impact of the dew tower be enough to be concerned about when placed irresponsibly?
Second question would be... again, in the desert it is not much of a concern due to its very own dry properties, but in other places with a more significant airborne lifeforms, wouldnt maintenance costs be something to consider greatly?
Third... rainwater is clean by itself, but wouldn't the opening that leads the drain water to the barrel-container be very open for any airborne of sizes small to microscopic to enter it? And if so, wouldn't that make it much more difficult to maintain?
Dont get me wrong, these are wonderful ideas, but as a university student majoring in biology, i am genuinely curious about these questions and some more that could come out depending on the answers to them

Everyone seems to say the same thing about how we should be more environmentally friendly. I will get this out of the way now. I don't believe in climate change or in my day global warming. But I do see how we disrupt mother natures way of doing things. I have a degree in environmental science and I have been a excavator for the better part of my life. Those two can help each other. Here is the kicker. To do so it requires companies that are "to big to fail" to stop suppressing technology including people like bill gates. we have had technologies that have been better than what we have now if companies were not gready. One example; the 100 mile per gallon carburetor. Does anyone know the reason why  asphalt roads need drainage? Well asphalt is a liquid and it likes to move. If you don't keep the ground below it drained it will sink. Causing dips holes and cracks. Those drainage ditches dump water in the wrong places. They also stop water from flowing the way it should. Example; have you ever looked at a hillside that was cut out for a road and on a dry day seen the rock wet. that's because they cut out a section of a underground river, stream, or a seasonal stream. Now think about all the other things that we think needs to be kept dry " house foundation " and apply that same design. We disrupt water flow with just about everything. Putting water into the nearest stream or river does not work. One of the best thing that a person or a homeowner can do is have a septic system that requires your water use to be put back in the ground. Instead of hooking up your rain water from the roof. Either collect the water and use it or put leach lines into the ground and put it back into the ground. If you water fell there keep it there. For you dummies that farm or live in a area that gets little to no rain. Stop pumping it out of the ground. Because you can never replace the water back to the aquifer. And those who pipe water from a rainy area. So, that you can water your yard. You do the most damage of all. Yes I am talking about you mostly in Las vegas. The next thing that is damaging is the mower. What people think are ugly weeds are actually very good for the environment. It helps to hold in water. The ground doesn't get so hot and helps speed up the evaporation process by heating up the ground. I wish that the real reason for the water cycle is being disrupted.

The problem with dew collectors is the air from which the water is collected will contain air pollution… it has water and mold mildew and other microbes as well as insects that land in dog shit with more bacteria will land in the collected water and culture. When you drink it, you will get sick… not when the dew collector is new but as it gets used, and not cleaned, you will get sick when drinking it.

इस धरती पर सभी रूप , उस अनाम शक्ति का ही है, जिसे तुम शिव - पार्वती कहते हो। तुमसब अपनी सभी रूपो मे,  सच्चे शिव - पार्वती  ही हमेशा होते हो, जब भी तुमसब मानव के रूप मे, इस धरती पर दिखाइ देते है। तुमसबो की आंखों से, जो भी जीव इस ब्रह्माण्ड मे दिखाई देता है, वह सभी जीव अपने ही शिव - पार्वती का ही सच्चा रूप है। जब सभी रूप ही शिव - पार्वती का सच्चा रूप ही है, तो फिर इतने मंदिर, इतने पूजा-पाठ, इतने व्रत- त्योहार, किसलिए। इस धरती पर एक ही सच्चा धर्म है, जिसे सनातन धर्म कहा जाता है। सनातन धर्म वह धर्म है, जिस धर्म को जानकर, सभी मानव अपने रूप मे ही शिव - पार्वती को, अपनी ही आंखों से देखकर, अपनी शरीर रूपी जीवन-मिरतु से हमेशा मुक्त रहता है। इस धरती पर सनातन धर्म को छोड़कर, सभी धर्म झूठे है, जो बाद मे किसी शैतान रूपी मानव द्वारा , जबरदस्ती बनाया गया है, जैसे कि इस्लाम धर्म और ईसाई धर्म।  जीसस जैसे सच्चे मानव की हत्या करके, इसाई धर्म को जबरदस्ती, इस धरती पर बनाया गया है। जब ईसाई धर्म के लोग, अपने भगवान की हत्या कर सकते है, तो उन दानव रूपी धर्म को मानने वाले मानव, कैसे अपने रूप मे, शिव - पार्वती को देख सकते है, और कैसे अपनी मिरतु के पार, अपनी ही ज्ञान से हो सकते है। इस धरती पर अगर सबसे खराब या सबसे अंधा धर्म है, वह सिर्फ मुस्लिम धर्म है। मुस्लिम धर्म इसलिए शैतानो का धर्म है, क्योंकि इस धर्म के लोग, न अपने को उस बेनाम ख़ुदा का रूप मानते है, न किसी दूसरे धर्म के लोगो को, खुदा का सच्चा रूप होना स्वीकार करते है, इसलिए इस धर्म के लोग, झूठी धर्म को बनाकर, अपने ही जैसे दुसरे लोगो की हत्या करते है। इस धरती पर एक ही धर्म सच्चा है, जो सिर्फ हिन्दू जानते है। हिन्दू धर्म के लोग, सभी धर्मों के लोगो को अपना मानते है, कयोकि इस धर्म के लोग जानते है कि, सभी रूपो मे, उनका एक ही शिव - पार्वती रहते है, इसलिए वे सभी लोगो को अपना मान लेते है, जिसकारण, भारत देश के लोग को, कोइ भी शैतान गुलाम बना देता है। इस धरती पर अगर कोइ भी देश अगर सदियों से सच्चा है, तो वह भारत देश ही है। इस देश के लोग हमेशा सच्चे , निर्दोष, दयालु होते है। किसी को भी अपना मान लेते है, जिसकारण कभी मुस्लिमों द्वारा तो कभी अंग्रेजो द्वारा, गुलाम बना दिए जाते थे। जबतक भाजपा की सरकार रहेगी, यह देश कभी गुलाम नहीं होगा। भारत देश को कोइ भी देश, कभी गुलाम नही बना सकता है युद्ध करके। मोदी को या भारत देश को, कोइ अगर गुलाम बना सकता है, तो वह कोरोना का वैक्सीन है, जो उन अंग्रेजों ने ही बनाया है, जिसमे वह सब अंग्रेज, मानव शरीर मे एक वैसी वायरस  को, वैक्सीन की मदद से, स्थापित कर रहा है, जिस वायरस को, कभी भी ऐक्टिव करके, तुमसबो की दिमाग को शिथिल किया जा सकता है, जिस कारण भविष्य मे भारत देश को भी, फिर से गुलाम बनाया जा सकता है।अब कोइ भी देश युद्ध करके, किसी भी देश को गुलाम नहीं बना सकता है, क्योंकि सभी देश के पास परमाणु बम है। इसलिए कुछ दानव रूपी पश्चिम के वैज्ञानिकों ने, इस मृत शरीर को, फिर से गुलाम करने के लिए, कोरोना वैक्सीन के नाम पर, तुमसबो की शरीर में, उस वायरस को मेहमान बना दिया है, जिसको कभी भी और किसी भी समय, ऐक्टिव करके, तुम सबों की दिमाग को, अपने अनुसार चलाकर, पुरी दुनिया को गुलाम बना दिया है। तुम सब जितने भी मानव वैक्सीन से बच गए हो अभी तक, तुम सब उस वैक्सीन को न लेकर, अपनी दिमाग को, किसी दुसरे लोगो की, दिमाग की गुलामी करने से बचा सकते हो। तुम सबों की शरीरबनी ही है मरने को। शरीर का स्वभाव ही है मर जाना। लेकिन तुम सब भारतीय तो, उस परम शिव - पार्वती के वह  सच्चे रूप हो, तुम सब कैसे कभी मर सकते हो। भारत भगवान को जानता है।  वह अपने ही रूप में, और सभी जीवों के रूप में, अपने शिव- पार्वती को ही देखता है, वह कैसे कभी मर नहीं सकता। पश्चिम या युरोप देश के मानव विज्ञान यानी सिर्फ मानव के शरीर को जानता है, इसलिए वह सब मरा ही पैदा होता है। वह सब भगवान को अपने रूप में होना कभी मानता ही नहीं है, इसलिए वह सब शरीर को ही सिर्फ, अपना सत्य का होना जानकर, उसी के साथ ही जीवित रहता है, फिर शरीर के साथ ही मरता रहता है। भारत के सनातनी धर्म के लोग, अपने शरीर के रूप मे ही, सिर्फ अपनी ज्ञान से, अपने सच्चे शिव - पार्वती को, अपनी ही आंखों से देखकर, सदा के लिए, मुक्त रहता है, इसलिए भारत के लोग अमर होते हैं।

Seriously, I had a gardener friend in Atlanta who owned a small house with small yard and small gardens. During the drought and water crisis that gripped the city some years ago, when there were severe restrictions on the use of city water, she was able to keep some of her most vulnerable plants alive and even retrieve extra water from the air which she could use to flush toilets, all by diverting the runoff from a large window AC unit.

She said that the situation had been so dire that restrictions had been placed even on AC condensate, but they never got round to regulating window units. I suppose that’s probably because the condensate from those units is not typically plumbed anywhere; instead just allowed to drip out of a small hose in the back.

Your video reminds me of how some of the poorest people in the world get hot (or at least quite warm) water, primitively plumbed into their homes via gravity, much the same way water towers work. During the monsoon seasons of Africa and Asia, at least in the parts where I have traveled, people catch as much natural rainwater as they possibly can. On the roofs of their houses, or else on a raised platform if the roof cannot support it, there will be two tanks, one of which is painted black, storing water that is piped into the house below. In each neighborhood, people will share and pass around a pump or two to keep those tanks full, and of course the black one soaks up the sun’s heat and provides warm water for bathing and cleaning, so they don’t need to burn so much fuel heating it.
